tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ImageData (
    image_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_data BYTEA,
    image_description TEXT,
    image_format VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE VideoTags (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    video_id INT,
    tag_name VARCHAR(50),
    start_time INT,
    end_time INT
);

CREATE TABLE images (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  image_name VARCHAR(255),
  image_data BYTEA
)

CREATE TABLE videos (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  video_name VARCHAR(255),
  video_data BYTEA
)

CREATE TABLE image_tags (
  tag_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  image_id INT,
  tag_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE video_tags (
  tag_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  video_id INT,
  tag_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE image_video_mapping (
  image_id INT,
  video_id INT,
  PRIMARY KEY (image_id, video_id)
)
